Key Match Events: The Kansas City Royals lost to the Houston Astros on Thursday night, 6-3
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals lost first baseman and middle-of-the-order bat Vinnie Pasquantino to a broken thumb, which could impact their playoff run
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals are just 1.5 games behind the Cleveland Guardians in the American League Central and are holding firm to the second wild card spot in the American League
Others: The Royals will need to rely more on superstars Salvador Perez and Bobby Witt Jr. without Pasquantino
